oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Morgan's Grand March
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lithographed sheet music cover with Confederate General John Hunt Morgan in center.

Kentucky cavalryman John Hunt Morgan and his men were best known for their hit-and-run tactics on Union positions. Morgan's 1863 raid into southern Indiana and Ohio was celebrated in the press but did nothing to affect the war's outcome. He and most of
